name: Little Red Lie (itch) (ralphyua, Rinkaku, RatQueen87, Claire Maker, thecodewarrior, Ifrah)
name_original: Little Red Lie (itch) (ralphyua, Rinkaku, RatQueen87, Claire Maker, thecodewarrior, Ifrah)
description:
Red has come back to the forest to honor her grandmother, killed ten years ago by the wolf. There, she meets a mysterious cat who helps her embark on a journey of intrigue and mystery. Solve puzzles while avoiding monsters as you help Red discover the truth about what really happened to her grandma...

Play through all 4 endings!
